editorialSummary.text: Store offering shipping, packaging, printing & other services, plus office supplies.

originalText.text:
Awful service the guy who at work Friday 27 by 14:00 should be improve the customer service , no helpful , I came to return a package , he took a terrible attitude , by the end he threw  my package like a whatever thing

. With not tape ( because I try to taped there ).

originalText.text:
Guy did not tell me the price in advance. Once my letter was package he told me the price and it was really expensive $61.42. I was not agree with the price but of course was ready to send. I am disappointed. I had to pay. He overcharged me. I went to your office because I thought were cheaper than Fedex or DHL. I will never return.

I sent a form to get the apostille and I paid $10 for that. But to send it I paid $61.42 just because I needed to put inside a self addresses envelope to they return it to me. Doesn't make sense.

I did an international delivery with DHL and I paid $25.00. This is a same state delivery and paid $61.42.

originalText.text: The Hispanic woman with the tattoos on her arm tried to charge me $350 for regular shipping. I went to the store on 72nd Street, and they told me it would cost $100. She told us she could call them. We said, ‚ÄúGo ahead.‚Äù She didn't call them and told us the shipping was in reality $100. What a horrible person.

originalText.text: Very unprofessional employee. It's unfortunate that they wasted such a great location by employing someone so rude and unprofessional. There is a reason this place gets so many horrible reviews. The owner should really consider hiring someone else that fits the job better. If you have a choice, use a different location and avoid the headaches.
